title: Portrait mode photos creating separate folder for Each photos...
content:
Each time I take a photo in portrait mode, the camera adds the photo to a new folder. So, ten photos means ten separate folders.
 
If I'm doing a mini "photo shoot", I might have 30 photos, each in its own folder.
 
This makes it tedious, slow and frustrating to view the photos from a third-party app or to copy the photos to the desktop.
 
How can we turn off this behavior, please?
